Deciding that now would be a good time to get away from these two very large ladies above you, you look around and see the table next to this one isn't very far away. And even better, it looks empty. You look around to make sure that no one is coming. After a minute or so, it looks clear enough, so you dash out. You're almost to the table when suddenly the sky is darkened. You look up to see a very large jacket falling onto you. You're too far away to avoid it, so it lands on you.

You struggle and squirm, trying to get out. However, in the process, you have gotten your arms stuck tin the fabric. While trying to get out, the jacket is lifted up, and your arm is suddenly yanked free. You free fall, closing your eyes, afraid that this might be the end for you. However, you are soon met with more cloth, and look around. You landed in a small shallow pocket of the jacket. You're able to look up and out to see what's going on.

As you raise your head out of the jacket, you can see that whoever dropped it has put it back on, and is walking away from the table you had intended to hide under. You look forwards and see that instead, they are going to another section of the room.
144.title: Shoulda thought that one through a little more...

choices: You jump toward one of the bowls to soften your fall.
Climb along the jacket to get to a safer place.
The girl decices to remove her jacket before eating.
1441.content:
From a limited vantage point, you can see the jacket wearer is headed toward the table with all the food. If you hadn't eaten before coming to the prom, your miniaturized stomach might have been pleading with you by now. The maddening part of your position was that you couldn't see above the pocket you were in, to see the person's face, and you couldn't look much lower than the pocket except too far in front of them. Since you could just barely see the person's legs or it's easy to identify gender, but not much else. The jacket wearer is female, and she has just approached the table, along with a few fellow stragglers who haven't gone to dance yet. You sink back into the pocket, for fear that you might slip out as your carrier had to elbow through the snacking crowd.

As you reach the table, it becomes apparent that you may have a chance to escape the pocket, if you dared to part from your carrier. Again you frustrated desire to get a look around is denied by your current location in the pocket, so you're itching to get out as the jacket-wearing chick leans over to get some food. There were a couple of options for you. Take a risky dive from the pocket and hope to land in one of the ample bowls below, or take this pause in her walking to traverse the jacket for a safer spot to be kept. In this pocket you were in constant danger of slipping out, such as now, when you were holding onto the light jacket's inner lining to anchor yourself in against the tug of gravity. So it's either jump ship or just try to make some home improvements.
1441.title: Transported By Jacket Girl

choices: You get scooped up on the chip!
You're able to swim away fast enough.
14411.content:
Figuring that getting away from this girl would be for the best, you dive out of the pocket towards the food table. If you could land in a bowl of something soft, you'd be saved from a lot of pain. And you saw that you were going to land in a bowl of orange-yellow, which was probably a cheese dip.

*PLOP*

When you resurfaced, you found that it was hard to keep afloat, the cheese almost seeming to pull you down. You than began to swim to the closest side of the bowl to climb out, but then you looked up for some reason, and saw that a chip was being dipped into the cheese, right where you were!
14411.title: Maybe not the best choice...

choices: You got eaten and was trapped untill the next day.
You fell off the chip and into the girl's silk bra.
144111.content: No matter how fast you moved you were just to slow in the dip.The chip had scooped you up along with a large amount of dip.You had a hard time moving in the dip but could see.You saw that it was a girl.You didn't know her but she looked kinda sexy.She had long black hair and a very pale white skin.She also had C or D-cup breast that worked well on her small body.She looked only about 4 and a half feet tall.Then you notice that you were heading right for her mouth.You started to panic and tried to get out of the dip.Then you.....
144111.title: Scooped up on the chip!

choices: The girl felt you squirming between her boobs, and looks down to find you.
The girl resumes eating, leaving you trapped in cleavage canyon.
1441112.content:
As you sit on the chip and watch the sexy girl's gaping mouth come closer to you, you begin to panic. You struggle wildly in an attempt to free your body from the dip, but you don't seem to be having much luck. Your body was glued tight to the chip, and there was simply no way that you could escape in time. Just as it seemed inevitable that you were going to end up as a snack for this busty beauty, someone bumped into her from behind and caused her to drop the chip!

As the chip (and you along with it) falls through the air, you miraculously manage to dislodge your minuscule body from the gooey dip. Just as you think that the nightmare is finally over, you realize that your falling trajectory won't land you safely on the table as you had thought. Instead, you realized that you were falling straight toward the girl's massive cleavage! Within moments, you land between the mounds of her breasts and find yourself trapped.

You squirm around in an attempt to free yourself from this new plush prison, but your arms are pinned helplessly to your sides by the girl's fleshy orbs. Eventually, you simply surrender to the fact that you can't escape from your current position. All you can do is sit in the girl's tight cleavage and wait for whatever happens next.

What does happen next?
1441112.title: Stuck in her cleavage!

choices: Faith is kind and keeps you as a pet.
Faith has a darkside and makes you her slave
14411122.content:
You tried to climb out of your wonderful prison but all you did was get even more stuck.You started to panic,but then you realized where you were.Feeling the massive flesh of this girls mounds on your body felt amazing.You loved breast more then you loved your girlfriend Liz.You loved to grab them and hold then.You loved to play and squeeze them every time you could.You couldn't help but realize the irony.You always squeezed breast,now the breast squeezed you.

Then you felt the girl move.She must of been leaving the table.You didn't know where she was going and you couldn't see anything but darkness from inside the girl's soft yet ferm fun bags.Then you heard a car staring and realized the girl was leaving the prom.You didn't know where she was going and didn't really care,so long as you were able to stay between her breast.You then closed your eyes to take a quick nap.You let the sound of the girls heart and breathing slowly lul you to sleep.When you opened your eyes you saw that you were still in the girls breast.

---2 hours ago---

Faith was a 17 year old girl.She always dressed like a goth but was really a kind person.Faith was very shy and dressed like a goth to keep people away from her.She was heading to her appartment to enjoy her life now that she was out of school and had college in a year.But untill then she would stay home and play with her pet Snake named Rayan or Ray for short.Ray was a golden color female snake that loved to eat live pray.As Faith entered her appartment she past her glass tank with Ray inside.

"Hello Ray,I hope your hungry.I got a nice tasty mouse for you.But first I should change."Faith said in a soft voice.

The Faith entered her room.It was alittle messy but not to bad.Then Faith removed her back dress and undid her black bra.

---Back to you---

Just as you awoke you fell out from your heavenly prison and onto a large bed.You looked around and saw that every thing was eather black or pink.Then you saw the girl...
14411122.title: Trapped in Heaven

choices: It's hanging on a chair right next to the food table.
It was put down on a table, which a bunch of girls are chatting at.
14413.content:
Just as you're preparing to jump, you catch wind of what the girl is doing now. She's suddenly steering away from the food table, and for a second you wonder if youmisjudged where she was headed. Soon, though, it becomes apparent that she's about to remove her jacket before she ate or danced. The girl's colossal, manicured hand suddenly fills your view as it swings by yoiur pocket, fingers clasping the jacket's zipper. The harsh grinding noise of the zipper is heavily amplified in your tiny, sensitive eardrums.

When the terrible noise is finished, and you can safely pull your hands from your ears, you realize you only have a matter of seconds to prepare for the jacket's deposition. Seeing no stake in trying to dive off at this point, you merely dig yourself into the pocket in a ball, holding onto its inner lining for dear life. If you could just ride this out, your survival chances might not be so bad. After some shuffling and a final thump as the jacket was put down, you emerge from your "bunker" and look around at these new surroundings.
14413.title: Put Me Down

info.brief_description: You're at the Prom when you suddenly shrink.  Please Add Chapters.
info.description:
This is a like pretty much every other shrinking story out there. Please add if you can. Here are the rules.

No One-Liners. Unless it's absolutely necessary please make additions at least 1 paragraph, which is really a minimum of 3 sentences.
No Killing the Main Character. Simple as that, don't kill him until it's a ways into the story.
Female Interaction Only. That means no Male on Male. However, feel free to have multiple women using you at once.
Please keep the story in Second Person Point-Of-View. It could get really confusing if the POV kept changing mid story.
Other than that pretty much have fun with it, but try to follow the direction the story is going.

Characters:
Austin(You) Age: 17
Description: Shaggy brown hair, medium height, and popular. A Senior in high school, you just broke up with your girlfriend, Jenna, and are now dating the hot slut of the school, Liz.

Jenna Age: 18
Description: Shoulder-length red hair, tall, around C-cup breast size, perfect thighs, and small ass. She just turned 18, and may still hold a grudge because you broke up with her on her Birthday.

Liz Age: 17
Description: Long blonde hair, usually in a pony tail, medium height, D, if not DD-cup breast size, thighs slightly larger then Jenna's, and perfect ass that's just round and soft enough that it's not small, but it's not fat either. She's the school's resident slut, so you know she's been around. But that's why you dumped Jenna, you wanted a piece of her. Since you only started dating a few days ago though, you haven't had the chance yet, but you hope that'll change after the prom tonight. Though this is fiction(obviously) please try to refrain from doing things that would seem to unrealistically possible.

You can add characters, but try to add a description when you do. The story does not have to stay at the prom, as that would be boring. Feel free to have the Giantess of the story take him wherever they please, and there is no time limit. However, as pointed out, refrain from describing things that the character otherwise wouldn't know.

~EDIT~

I would like to thank these writers for adding to the story:

Neon
Alex

Thanks for all of your great additions.



If you're looking for something a little different, please try out my newest interactive, Shrunk in a New World.

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1782369-Shrunk-in-a-New-World
